content.description: This is located on the front face of the boulder, cruise up the slabby face.
content.location: From the parking lot, cross the street and follow the orange (dot) trail for about 10 minutes. Take a sharp right up a ridge (still orange trail, I believe) and continue up a steep hill. The boulder is located on top. This route is located on the front face of the Orange Fork Boulder.

content.description: Start low on the corner of the right and back faces (the block is on for feet), and continue up the arete. The topout is in same corner area as topout for Geometric.
content.location: From the parking lot, cross the street and follow the orange (dot) trail for about 10 minutes. Take a sharp right up a ridge (still orange trail I believe) and continue up a steep hill. Boulder is located on top. This route is located on the corner of the right and back faces of the Orange Fork boulder.

content.description: Start down low on a small, horizontal ledge/crack, then head up through the face to a slopey topout. The flake in the middle is a bit loose.
content.location: From the parking lot, cross the street and follow the orange (dot) trail for about 10 minutes. Take a sharp right up a ridge (still orange trail, I believe), and continue up a steep hill. The boulder is located on top. This problem is located on the back face.

content.description: Cruise up the big crack in the face, and avoid using the block at the bottom for a foot hold.
content.location: From the parking lot, cross the street and follow the orange (dot) trail for about 10 minutes. Take a sharp right up a ridge (still orange trail, I believe) and continue up a steep hill. The boulder is located on top. Head around the right side of the boulder, this route is located in the middle of the side face.

content.description: This is a decent block with four current problems.
